data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Beginning in late December 1778, the British captured Savannah and controlled the Georgia coastline. In 1780, ____ launched a fresh ____ and ____ Charleston, as ____. A ____ victory ____ the Battle of Camden meant ____ royal ____ soon ____ most ____ Georgia ____ South Carolina. The British set up a network of forts inland, hoping that the Loyalists would rally to the flag.
data.partBlankContent: Beginning in late December 1778, the British captured Savannah and controlled the Georgia coastline. In 1780, th__ launched a fresh inva____ and to__ Charleston, as we__. A signi______ victory a_ the Battle of Camden meant th__ royal for___ soon contr_____ most o_ Georgia a__ South Carolina. The British set up a network of forts inland, hoping that the Loyalists would rally to the flag.
data.answer: 从1778年12月下旬开始，英国人占领了萨凡纳，并控制了格鲁吉亚的海岸线。1780年，他们发动了新的入侵，同样占领了查尔斯顿。卡姆登战役的一场重大胜利意味着皇家军队很快控制了乔治亚州和南卡罗来纳州的大部分地区。英国人在内陆建立了一个堡垒网络，希望保皇派能团结起来。
